channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 09:47 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 09:47 The threat of shelling! Now in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community artillery shelling. Walk to shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 09:41 Air anxiety in Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.

item.title: 游리 09:21 Drawing anxiety in Kharkiv region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 游리 09:21 Drawing anxiety in Kharkiv region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
